name: bagpipe
content:

related to or played on bagpipes (= a Scottish or Irish instrument played by blowing through a pipe into a bag): bagpipe music He plays with the university bagpipe band. See
bagpipes
More examplesFewer examplesA bagpipe busker plays on the corner every Saturday.The band will take part in the bagpipe competition.They're a bagpipe group who play pop tunes and rock and roll.
